Uses of Interface
org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml.builders.SpanQueryBuilder

  • Packages that use SpanQueryBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml
    Parser that produces Lucene Query objects from XML streams.
    org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml.builders
    XML Parser factories for different Lucene Query/Filters.

    • Uses of SpanQueryBuilder in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml

      Classes in org.apache.lucene.queryparser.xml that implement SpanQueryBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CoreParser
      Assembles a QueryBuilder which uses only core Lucene Query objects
      class  CorePlusExtensionsParser
      Assembles a QueryBuilder which uses Query objects from Lucene's sandbox and queries modules in addition to core queries.
      class  CorePlusQueriesParser
      Assembles a QueryBuilder which uses Query objects from Lucene's queries module in addition to core queries.
